sentences: Rahul Ranade (born 23 May 1966) is a music composer.
Thanks to the encouragement from his mother, he continued to pursue his passion for music even thru his college days.
She has a B. Com/MBA and now has her own marketing firm, Mirage Creations.
Rahul has been one of the founders for Grips Theater, Pune - associated with Grip Theater, Germany.
As part of the 100 years of Indian Cinema initiative, he composed music for India’s first film, "Raja Harishchandra" directed by Dadasaheb Phalke
